Q_DESC:
To write a menu driven program in which the user has to perform operations in doubly linked list (DELETION).
The MENU is supposeed to look like the below example:
1. Create List
2. Reverse linked list
3. Display list
0. Exit
The user is supposed to use the exact numberings as shown above.
INPUT:
1 //create list(option 1 in menu)
3 //number of elements in the list
11 //element one
22 //eleement two
33 //element three
3 //display list(option 3 in menu)
2 //Reverse the linked list(option 2 in menu)
3 //display list(option 3 in menu)
0 //Exit(option 0 in menu) 
OUTPUT:

DATA IN THE LIST:
DATA of 1 node = 11
DATA of 2 node = 22
DATA of 3 node = 33


DATA IN THE LIST:
DATA of 1 node = 33
DATA of 2 node = 22
DATA of 3 node = 11
TESTCASE_1:
1 3 11 22 33 3 2 3 0

DATA of 2 node = 22
DATA of 3 node = 11
DATA IN THE LIST:
DATA of 1 node = 11
DATA of 2 node = 22
DATA of 3 node = 33


DATA IN THE LIST:
DATA of 1 node = 33
DATA of 2 node = 22
DATA of 3 node = 11
